job.title: Machine Learning Engineer Developer
job.description: We are looking for machine learning engineers with experience over a large diverse machine learning landscape to join our team in Austin Texas Candidates should have a deep familiarity with reinforcement learning genetic algorithms predictive modeling complex systems and analysismanipulation of high dimensional data Fluency in deep learning and its best practices is also preferredbrbrstronguWhat Youll Be DoingbrustrongulliBe part of the compiler applied machine learning and artificial intelligence team developing new and innovative solutions in and around compilers and development toolsliliWork with enthusiastic and dedicated people at the forefront of science and technology trends You will have the opportunity to innovate in areas ranging from machine learning algorithms system design processor architecture and see your work used in products all over the worldbrliulstronguWhat We Need To SeebrustrongulliBS MS PhD or equivalent experience in CS CE EECS or related with a focus on machine learning and compilers and development toolslili3 years experience in SW Engineering focused on tools development machine learning or equivalentliliA background in compilers is highly desirableliliExperience with Julia LISP  Scheme Python and C  CliliSufficient educational background to understand the science and mathematics involved in the above technologiesliliA strong desire to create real working products that use the latest scientific resultsbrliulWith competitive salaries and a generous benefits package we are widely considered to be one of the technology worlds most desirable employers We have some of the most forwardthinking and hardworking people in the world working for us and due to unprecedented growth our exclusive engineering teams are rapidly growing If youre a creative and autonomous engineer with a real passion for technology we want to hear from youbrbrNVIDIA is committed to fostering a diverse work environment and proud to be an equal opportunity employer As we highly value diversity in our current and future employees we do not discriminate including in our hiring and promotion practices on the basis of race religion color national origin gender gender expression  sexual orientation age marital status veteran status disability status or any other characteristic protected by lawdeeplearningbrbr
